nodes.text: Alpha-58, also known as Trantos, was a Alpha-Class Advanced Recon Commando who fought for the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.

Alpha-58 was an Alpha-class Advanced Recon Commando, and he held the rank of commander. During the Clone Wars, he traveled to the planet Pzandias with a Jedi Padawan, where they investigated a training facility that Count Dooku, the leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, had established on the world.
